properties.entry: SELECT ADMIN_NO,ADMIN_NM,ADMIN_TEL,ADMIN_EMAIL FROM ADMIN_ACCOUNT WHERE ADMIN_EMAIL=? AND ADMIN_PW=?
UPDATE ADMIN_CERTIFICATION SET C_NUMBER = ?, ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = ?

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND C_NUMBER = ?) = 1
THEN NVL( (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND ISSUE_DT + (INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) >= SYSDATE) , '2')
ELSE '3' END FROM DUAL
